projects.title: Balance Confirmation (uabpay app)
projects.description: Developed back-end APIs for uabpay Digital Wallet to generate bank balance confirmation statements with secure email delivery.
highlights: Developed back-end APIs for direct download and E-mail sending features
Added encrypted request/response body schema for security
Implemented session control to prevent fraud and illegal access
Integrated with Core Banking system for account information retrieval
Developed SOAP API with XML format for Core Banking communication
Implemented secure email delivery using Mailgun APIs

projects.title: SGH+ App
projects.description: A white label wallet application developed in collaboration with Sein Gay Har shopping mart for seamless payments and transactions.
highlights: Developed core back-end APIs for user registration and authentication
Implemented payment system APIs for various transaction scenarios
Optimized transaction flows to align with existing voucher systems
Deployed and maintained system in UAT environment with ongoing support

projects.title: Admin Portal for MAI Xtra
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive MVC web application for managing daily transactions and user registrations in the MAI Xtra system.
highlights: Designed and implemented intuitive admin interface for transaction monitoring
Created efficient database schema ensuring scalability and maintainability
Implemented clean MVC architecture with modular design patterns
Developed CRUD operations for entity management
Integrated role-based access control for secure feature access

projects.title: Aung Bar Lay Lottery Payment API
projects.description: Developed and maintained third-party payment API integration for government lottery purchases through uabpay.
highlights: Integrated third-party payment API for secure lottery purchases
Implemented mobile app endpoints for payment processing
Ensured compliance with security standards for sensitive data
Implemented secure hash calculations using SHA256
Created comprehensive API documentation and guidelines

projects.title: uabpay Merchant Portal
projects.description: Led the development of a comprehensive merchant portal web application for digital wallet payment services.
highlights: Developed core features including transaction monitoring and fund transfers
Implemented secure authentication and authorization systems
Created APIs for transaction processing and balance checking
Developed automated payroll system for merchant employees
Implemented user management with role-based access control

projects.title: uabpay WinGold Campaign APIs
projects.description: Led the development of campaign APIs to drive user engagement and growth within the wallet system platform.
highlights: Designed APIs for campaign functionality and point calculations
Implemented secure authentication for campaign data access
Developed algorithms for friend invitation point system
Created APIs for leaderboard and winner display
Successfully increased user registrations through campaign implementation

projects.title: Umbraco CMS Developer
projects.description: Building Recruitment Websites with Umbraco CMS.
highlights: Developed and maintained recruitment websites using .NET Core and Umbraco CMS, ensuring high availability and performance
Designed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party job boards
Collaborated with front-end developers to build responsive and dynamic UI components
Provided ongoing support and maintenance post-launch, ensuring continuous improvements and prompt issue resolution

projects.title: Applicant Tracking System
projects.description: Applicant Tracking System with React, Typescript, and ASP.Net Core.
highlights: Developing a recruitment-focused Applicant Tracking System (ATS) website using ASP.NET Core for the API and React for the front-end
Implemented the features such as job posting management, candidate application tracking, resume parsing, automated interview scheduling, and employer dashboards
Integrated role-based access control for different user levels, ensuring secure and efficient recruitment workflows
Used CQRS in Backend APIs for clean code architecture
